pageTitle: Monster Heroes of Myths - Epic Battle Strategy Game
pageDescription: Play Monster Heroes of Myths - Command mighty warriors and mythical beasts in intense battles against evil forces!

hero.title: Welcome to Monster Heroes of Myths
hero.description: Lead legendary monsters and heroes into battle. Use your powers, deploy troops, and crush waves of enemies in this epic defense game!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Monster Heroes of Myths is a thrilling defense strategy game. Protect your base, summon powerful units, and defeat waves of dark forces. Here's how to get started:

steps.title: Summon Your Army
steps.description: Deploy heroes and monsters to your side of the battlefield. Each unit has unique powers and costs mana to summon.

steps.title: Defend Your Gate
steps.description: Prevent enemy units from reaching your side. Use strategy and timing to hold the line!

steps.title: Use Special Skills
steps.description: Activate powerful skills to turn the tide of battle. These abilities recharge over time‚Äîuse them wisely.

steps.title: Defeat All Waves
steps.description: Survive all enemy waves to complete the level and earn rewards for upgrades.

items.title: Mana System
items.description: Summon units using mana. Mana regenerates over time and is essential for building your army.

items.title: Unit Roles
items.description: Combine melee, ranged, and magic units to form a balanced team. Each role is vital in different battle situations.

items.title: Upgrade Path
items.description: Earn coins and gems to upgrade your units, increasing their power and durability.

items.title: Combat Engagement
items.description: Units automatically fight when enemies approach. The stronger team wins based on stats and numbers.

items.title: Level Progression
items.description: Complete stages to unlock new units, challenges, and increasingly difficult waves of enemies.

items.title: Special Units
items.description: Unlock legendary monsters and heroes with unique abilities to boost your strategic options.

tips.title: Balance Your Army
tips.description: Use a mix of units to handle both ground and air enemies effectively.

tips.title: Upgrade Wisely
tips.description: Focus on upgrading your most-used heroes and units first to get the best returns in battle.

tips.title: Time Your Skills
tips.description: Don‚Äôt waste special abilities. Use them when enemies gather in large groups for maximum effect.

tips.title: Save Mana
tips.description: Avoid spending all your mana early. Always keep some in reserve for emergencies.

battleArena.title: Enter the Mythic Battlefield
battleArena.description: Step into a world of myth and magic. Assemble your squad of heroes and monsters, and face off against waves of enemies in this ultimate defense challenge!
